page.title: 18CRAFT INDUSTRY IN KILTARLITY
page.content: HANTEL is an important cottage industry in Kiltarlity.It is run by Mike and Frances Wilson from Bruiach House,at the edge of the village. Frances designs original miniature pewter figures which are handpainted by local women in their homes.About 30 "outworkers" are employed in this way. Hantel exports literally all over the world to collectors and retailers. This year the Wilsons visited U.S.A. and returned with a prestigious order to produce miniatures of cartoon characters for Disneyland.This will be the first time that Francis has worked to someone else's design,as most of her own designs are based on historical or literary characters such as Alice in Wonderland,The Owl and the Pussycat etc.
